about_the_game:
This DLC enables all features of the game and upgrades you from the free version to the full experience.
By unlocking the DLC you will get the following benefits:

- Create maps using a rich set of integrated map making tools
- Access to multiple thousands of objects
- Ability to save your maps
- Access to all terrain textures
- Ability to host games for your friends (they will be able to join with the free version)
- Access to all 6 object layers
- Ability to paint in 8 terrain layers
- Access to more settings for weather & birds
- Ability to import images and objects (.obj)
- Create an infinite amount of tokens
- Use maps from the workshop
- Create multiple river nodes
- Create cutscenes with infinite destinations

This DLC enables all features of the game and upgrades you from the free version to the full experience.
By unlocking the DLC you will get the following benefits:

name: Wildshape Pro - Map Editor + VTT

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: Wildshape Pro - Map Editor + VTT (Hosting) - $39.99 USD

package_groups.title: Buy Wildshape Pro - Map Editor + VTT

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 570
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The performance highly varies depending on the set quality and amount of lights/objects used.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The performance highly varies depending on the set quality and amount of lights/objects used.

short_description: The pro version enables all features of the game including all map making functionality, thousands of objects and lets you host maps to your friends!
